backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with access control, extensive US geography types, proposal types, and helpers for initializing empty geography structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, documentation, hooks, and UI components across the project.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document detailing Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installation model, canister mapping, and modular subsystems.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Developer-focused guide for configuring, deploying, and upgrading Whisper on ICP with sample dfx setup.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes describing homepage redesign details including hero image implementation, contrast fixes, typography, spacing, and UI effects.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines multi-phase plan for building Whisper, detailing deliverables, non-goals, and scaling hooks from prototype to multi-installation system.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Describes the registry pattern for Secretary assistant navigation, enabling features to register destinations and routing behaviors.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Provides step-by-step smoke test procedures for verifying instance proposal creation and related follow-up actions like Issue Project tasks.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Defines Whisper’s visual design system including philosophy, color palette, typography, and usage guidelines.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global CSS.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling navigation, state for feature sections, Secretary integration, and image preloading.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Header component rendering the logo and a Get Started button with fixed positioning and styled visuals.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Reusable circular icon wrapper supporting size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Shared spinner + label component used to show loading states with consistent styling.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Main form component for creating an instance proposal, handling name validation, geography selection, description input, and submission state.
Dropdown component that loads and selects counties for a chosen state with loading and error handling.
Dropdown component for selecting a place within a county, including async loading and fallback UI.
Dropdown component that loads and selects U.S. states with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing detailed information and tabs for an issue project, including geography, status, description, and tasks.
Task management tab allowing users to create tasks, view task lists, and toggle task completion for an issue project.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog displaying proposal details with admin moderation actions and an option to open the issue project view.
Displays proposals list with loading/error states and opens proposal details via dialog.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Shows a dismissible card prompting users to try the Secretary assistant.
Implements the interactive Secretary chat widget with message handling and option matching.
Renders the Secretary widget into a dedicated overlay root using a React portal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance-name availability and submit new instance proposals with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, persistence, and provides an authentication context.
Provides hooks to fetch, create, and update tasks linked to a proposal via backend actor.
Custom React hook that syncs state to localStorage with SSR guards and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: React hook that preloads an image and returns ready/error status with console warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for backend actions like checking parent relationships, fetching proposals, and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages secretary chat state, including messages, menu visibility, and reset/navigation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Registry for navigation destinations with keyword lookup, navigation actions, and registration helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update a proposal’s status and invalidate related proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React-query hooks for fetching US geography data (states, counties, places) with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, color tokens, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Formats proposal geography into readable strings and provides labels for geography levels.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Utility for deep link parsing/creation and secretary navigation options with keyword matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them to sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts unknown errors into friendly user messages while logging the original error for debugging.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, existing features, new feature requests, and architectural notes for ongoing development.
